name: Homestead (itch)
description:
Homestead is a contemplative game in which you harvest plants and explore procedural floating islands.

Sleep in your ship to make new islands appear and sell your harvest in order to buy new hooks to explore the world.

Keyboard controls :
WASD / ZQSD - Move
Mouse - Look
Left Click - Shoot current resource
Right Click - Collect / Destroy

Made by Constantin Liétard and Thomas Denis

OSX & Linux builds are untested
Font : https://managore.itch.io/m6x11
